briefdescription.para: Comprehensive unit tests for LocalSports library.

detaileddescription.para:
Test Suite Author
2025
1.0
This test file provides comprehensive unit test coverage for the LocalSports library. It includes tests for database operations, authentication, CRUD operations, and data structure validation.

simplesect.para: Some interactive functions require I/O mocking for complete testing
